# Steps
Each step is explained in this chapter.

## Data step
Allows a user to create a projection for visualization and computation.

## Gather
Allows a user to gather many factors into one factor.

## Join:leftTable
Allows a user to link to external data.

## Join:rightTable
Allows a user to link to external data.

## Query Data step 
Allows a user to perform a project without a computation.

## External View Data step
Allows a user to connect to an external web apps (i.e. shiny app).


## Wizard
Maps the factors in your workflow with what is in the data.

## Input
Used as the first step in an app workflow.

## Output:out
Used as the last step in an app workflow.
